p: Methyl maleopimarate is a white solid. It can be prepared from abietic acid, iodomethane and maleic anhydride, according to Scheme 22, prior to recrystallization [ 82]. It can be used as bio-based curing agent for epoxies [ 82, 183], as well as in synthesis of binaphthyl-appended crown ethers derived from rosin [ 184].
